member.summary: Allows child components to register to an owner component via this class shared as cascading value & parameter.

member.summary: Constructor.
member.param: Action to call StateHasChanged method. Due to server prerendering issue in .NET 5, the StateHasChanged must be called inside InvokeAsync, so the action is awaitable.
Function to return if the holding component is disposed.
Callback to call when the component is added to the collection.
Callback to call when the component is removed from thecollection.

member.summary: Unregisters from the collection and call state has changed (when owner is not disposed).

member.name: T:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.InputMode
member.summary: Enum for HTML input modes.

member.name: F:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.InputMode.Text
member.summary: Standard input keyboard for the user's current locale.

member.name: F:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.InputMode.None
member.summary: No virtual keyboard. For when the page implements its own keyboard input control.

member.name: F:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.InputMode.Decimal
member.summary: Fractional numeric input keyboard containing the digits and decimal separator for the user's locale (typically . or ,). Devices may or may not show a minus key (-).

member.name: F:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.InputMode.Numeric
member.summary: Numeric input keyboard, but only requires the digits 0–9. Devices may or may not show a minus key.

member.name: F:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.InputMode.Tel
member.summary: A telephone keypad input, including the digits 0–9, the asterisk (*), and the pound (#) key. Inputs that *require* a telephone number should typically use InputType.Tel instead.

member.name: F:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.InputMode.Search
member.summary: A virtual keyboard optimized for search input. For instance, the return/submit key may be labeled “Search”, along with possible other optimizations. Inputs that require a search query should typically use InputType.Search instead.

member.name: F:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.InputMode.Email
member.summary: A virtual keyboard optimized for entering email addresses. Typically includes the @ character as well as other optimizations. Inputs that require email addresses should typically use InputType.Email instead.

member.name: F:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.InputMode.Url
member.summary: A keypad optimized for entering URLs. This may have the / key more prominent, for example. Enhanced features could include history access and so on. Inputs that require a URL should typically use InputType.Url instead.

member.name: T:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.InputType
member.summary: Enum for HTML input types.
member.remarks: As the enum is currently used only for HxInputText component, only relevant types are included. As all the values will by needed, they can be added any later (add restrictions/validation to HxInputText then).

member.name: F:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.InputType.Text
member.summary: The default value. A single-line text field. Line-breaks are automatically removed from the input value.

member.name: F:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.InputType.Email
member.summary: A field for editing an email address. Looks like a input, but has validation parameters and relevant keyboard in supporting browsers and devices with dynamic keyboards.

member.name: F:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.InputType.Password
member.summary: A single-line text field whose value is obscured. Will alert user if site is not secure.

member.name: F:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.InputType.Search
member.summary: A single-line text field for entering search strings. Line-breaks are automatically removed from the input value. May include a delete icon in supporting browsers that can be used to clear the field. Displays a search icon instead of enter key on some devices with dynamic keypads.

member.name: F:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.InputType.Tel
member.summary: A control for entering a telephone number. Displays a telephone keypad in some devices with dynamic keypads.

member.name: F:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.InputType.Url
member.summary: A field for entering a URL. Looks like a input, but has validation parameters and relevant keyboard in supporting browsers and devices with dynamic keyboards.

member.name: M:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.ModelCloner.Clone``1(``0)
member.summary: Returns model clone. Uses strageties (in order): * * C# Records * Object.MemberwiseClone

member.name: T:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.HxChangeTracker
member.summary: Subscribes to INotifyPropertyChanged changes and triggers re-rendering of ChildContent. To be used when you want limit a scope of re-rendering and to prevent re-rendering of a wider component.

member.name: P:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.HxChangeTracker.ChildContent
member.summary: The content to which the value should be provided.

member.name: P:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.HxChangeTracker.Value
member.summary: The value to be tracked.

member.name: T:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.HxDynamicElement
member.summary:
Renders an element with the specified name, attributes and child-content.
Full documentation and demos: https://havit.blazor.eu/components/HxDynamicElement

member.name: P:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.HxDynamicElement.ElementName
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the element to render.

member.name: P:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.HxDynamicElement.OnClick
member.summary: Raised after the element is clicked.

member.summary: Triggers the event. Allows interception of the event in derived components.

member.name: P:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.HxDynamicElement.OnClickStopPropagation
member.summary: Stop onClick-event propagation. Deafult is false.

member.name: P:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.HxDynamicElement.OnClickPreventDefault
member.summary: Prevents the default action for the onclick event. Deafult is false.

member.name: P:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.HxDynamicElement.ElementRef
member.summary: Element reference.

member.name: P:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.HxDynamicElement.ElementRefChanged
member.summary: Action (synchronnous, not an EventCallback) called when the element's reference got captured.

member.name: T:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.HxRedirectTo
member.summary:
Rendering a HxRedirectTo will navigate to a new location.
Can be used in AuthorizeRouteView, Router and such components to process redirection to login page, error page or such.
Full documentation and demos: https://havit.blazor.eu/components/HxRedirectTo

member.name: P:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.HxRedirectTo.Uri
member.summary: URI to navigate to.

member.name: P:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.HxRedirectTo.ForceLoad
member.summary:
If true, bypasses client-side routing and forces the browser to load the new page from the server, whether or not the URI would normally be handled by the client-side router.
Default is false.

member.name: T:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.HxRepeater`1
member.summary:
A data-bound list component that allows custom layout by repeating a specified template for each item displayed in the list. Analogous to ASP.NET WebForms Repeater control.
Full documentation and demos: https://havit.blazor.eu/components/HxRepeater

member.name: P:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.HxRepeater`1.HeaderTemplate
member.summary: Template that defines how the header section of the Repeater component is displayed. Renders only if there are any items to display.

member.name: P:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.HxRepeater`1.ItemTemplate
member.summary: Template that defines how items in the Repeater component are displayed.

member.name: P:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.HxRepeater`1.FooterTemplate
member.summary: Template that defines how the footer section of the Repeater component is displayed. Renders only if there are any items to display.

member.name: P:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.HxRepeater`1.NullTemplate
member.summary: Template that defines what should be rendered in case of Items null.

member.name: P:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.HxRepeater`1.EmptyTemplate
member.summary: Template that defines what should be rendered in case of empty Items.

member.name: P:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.HxRepeater`1.Data
member.summary: Items to be rendered.

Displays an icon. Currently supports Bootstrap icons through BootstrapIcon class.

member.summary: Helper methods for selectors.

member.name: M:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.SelectorHelpers.GetText``1(System.Func{``0,System.String},``0)
member.summary: Returns text from item by textSelector. When textSelector is null, returns item.ToString(). Never returns null, null values are converted to empty string.

member.name: M:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.SelectorHelpers.GetValue``2(System.Func{``0,``1},``0)
member.summary: When item is null, returns default(TValue). Otherwise returns value from item by valueSelector. When valueSelector is null and TValue is same as TItem, returns item.

member.name: T:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Services.DataStores.DictionaryStaticDataStore`2
member.summary: Abstract base-class for implementation of your own dictionary-style static data store.
member.remarks: Uses in-memory Dictionary to store the data. Does not preload data, the data get loaded within first data-retriaval call. Does not implement any memory-release logic, the data get refreshed within data-retrivals where returns true.

member.name: M:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Services.DataStores.DictionaryStaticDataStore`2.LoadDataAsync
member.summary: Template method to implement the data retrival logic. You should never call this method directly, use to load data. This method is sequential (does not allow parallel runs), just take care of the data retrieval. Must return non-null value, use Enumerable.Empty if needed.

member.name: P:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Services.DataStores.DictionaryStaticDataStore`2.KeySelector
member.summary: Template selector to be used when building the dictionary from retrieved data.

member.name: P:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Services.DataStores.DictionaryStaticDataStore`2.IsLoaded
member.summary: Indicates whether the store has valid data.

member.name: M:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Services.DataStores.DictionaryStaticDataStore`2.ShouldRefresh
member.summary:
Template method to implement your own logic of data expiration/refresh. Gets called within all data-retrieval calls to check for refreshment need.
Can be implemented as "=> false" if you do not want the data to ever expire.

member.name: M:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Services.DataStores.DictionaryStaticDataStore`2.GetAllAsync
member.summary: Returns all data from the store (includes data load if needed).

member.name: M:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Services.DataStores.DictionaryStaticDataStore`2.GetAll(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Returns all data from the store (requires to be called first).

member.name: M:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Services.DataStores.DictionaryStaticDataStore`2.GetByKeyAsync(`0)
member.summary: Retrieves value from dictionary (includes data load if needed). Throws exception when key not found.

member.name: M:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Services.DataStores.DictionaryStaticDataStore`2.GetByKey(`0,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Retrieves value from dictionary (requires to be called first). Throws exception when key not found.

member.name: M:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Services.DataStores.DictionaryStaticDataStore`2.GetByKeyOrDefaultAsync(`0,`1)
member.summary: Retrieves value from dictionary (includes data load if needed). Returns default when not found.

member.name: M:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Services.DataStores.DictionaryStaticDataStore`2.GetByKeyOrDefault(`0,`1,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Retrieves value from dictionary (requires to be called first). Returns defaultValue when not found.

member.name: M:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Services.DataStores.DictionaryStaticDataStore`2.Clear
member.summary: Throws away all the data.

member.name: M:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Services.DataStores.DictionaryStaticDataStore`2.EnsureDataAsync
member.summary:
To be called before any data-retrival to load/refresh the data.
Is automatically called before all asynchronous data-retrieval calls. You have to call this method on your own (e.g. in OnInitializedAsync) before calling any sychronnous API.
Uses to check for refreshment request. Uses lock to prevent multiple parallel loads.

member.name: T:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Services.DataStores.StaticDataStore`1
member.summary: Abstract base-class for implementation of your own single-value static data store.
member.remarks: Uses in-memory static field to store the data. Does not preload data, the data get loaded within first data-retriaval call. Does not implement any memory-release logic, the data get refreshed within data-retrivals where returns true.

member.name: M:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Services.DataStores.StaticDataStore`1.LoadDataAsync
member.summary: Template method to implement the data retrival logic. You should never call this method directly, use to load data. This method is sequential (does not allow parallel runs), just take care of the data retrieval. Must return non-default value.

member.name: P:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Services.DataStores.StaticDataStore`1.IsLoaded
member.summary: Indicates whether the store has valid data.

member.summary:
Template method to implement your own logic of data expiration/refresh. Gets called within all data-retrieval calls to check for refreshment need.
Can be implemented as "=> false" if you do not want the data to ever expire.

To be called before any data-retrival to load/refresh the data.
Is automatically called before all asynchronous data-retrieval calls. You have to call this method on your own (e.g. in OnInitializedAsync) before calling any sychronnous API.
Uses to check for refreshment request. Uses lock to prevent multiple parallel loads.
